title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard is confusing.
EB: The message in the New Package Wizard should be clear and provide guidance on how to create a new package in the project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
